Package HMS.Systems

Class UserManagementSystem

java.lang.Object
HMS.Systems.UserManagementSystem
public class UserManagementSystem extends Object
Utility class to manage user authentication and role-specific access. It includes methods to add, load, save users, and authenticate them.

  • Constructor Details

    • UserManagementSystem

      public UserManagementSystem()

  • Method Details

    • getAllUsers

      public static List<User> getAllUsers()
      Retrieves all users in the system.
      Returns:
      a list of all users.

    • getUsersByRole

      public static List<User> getUsersByRole(UserRole role)
      Retrieves all users with a specific role.
      Parameters:
      role - the role to filter by (e.g., "patient", "doctor").
      Returns:
      a list of users with the specified role.

    • getUsersByRoles

      public static List<User> getUsersByRoles(Collection<UserRole> roles)
      Retrieves all users matching any of the specified roles.
      Parameters:
      roles - a collection of roles to filter by.
      Returns:
      a list of users matching the specified roles.

    • displayStaff

      public static void displayStaff()
      Displays all users with "pharmacist", "doctor", or "admin" roles in a table format.

    • addUser

      public static void addUser(User user)
      Adds a new user to the system and increments the relevant role-specific counter.
      Parameters:
      user - the user to add.

    • createUser

      public static User createUser(String role, String name, String gender, int age)
      Creates a user based on their role and registers them in the system with a default password of "password"
      Parameters:
      role - the role of the user (e.g., "patient", "doctor").
      name - the name of the user.
      gender - the gender of the user (Male or Female).
      age - the age of the user.
      Returns:
      the created User object.

    • updateUser

      public static void updateUser()
      Updates an existing user's details.

    • deleteUser

      public static void deleteUser()
      Deletes a user from the system.

    • addNewUserMenu

      public static User addNewUserMenu(String role)
      Adds a new user to the system interactively.
      Parameters:
      role - (nullable)

    • selectUserIDMenu

      public static String selectUserIDMenu(List<User> userList)
      Generates an input picker for selecting a user ID from a list of users.
      Parameters:
      userList - the list of users to pick from.
      Returns:
      the selected user ID, or null if the user cancels the selection.

    • login

      public static User login(String userId, String password)
      Authenticates a user's login. If the user is using the default password (their first time logging in), ask the user to change password
      Parameters:
      userId - the user ID.
      password - the password.
      Returns:
      the authenticated user if credentials are valid; otherwise, null.

    • updatePassword

      public static void updatePassword(String userId)
      Prompt User's password change and save the changes
      Parameters:
      user - the user whose password is to be updated.

    • loadUsers

      public static void loadUsers() throws IOException
      Loads users from the saved file. This method will read the users from the CSV and populate the users map.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • saveUsers

      public static void saveUsers()
      Saves all users to the file. This method writes all user HMS.data to the CSV file for persistence.
